id_table_3.caption: TABLE III: Comparison with SOTA pose-guided single-modality person ReID methods on the SYSU-MM01 [11] dataset in terms of Rank-1 accuracy(%percent\%) and mAP(%percent\%) at All-search setting. The dimension of features used for the evaluation is set as 2560 for all experiments. O​u​r​sI​D𝑂𝑢𝑟subscript𝑠𝐼𝐷Ours_{ID}* means P in Equ. (11) is set as 5. Impl. means experiments are implemented with the official source code provided.
